metadata.title: Kampeaburr Cosplay Mask LED Party Luminous Mask Music Mask Sound Activated Light Up Costume Masks for Any Festival and Gifts
features: 1. One Size Fits All. Adjust the Combination of Velcro and Straps on the Driver to Fit your Face;

2. There are Two Driver Functions, Voice-Activated Light Up Mode and Built-in Music Rhythm Mode (Press and hold the Switch for 3 Seconds to Turn on, and then hold the Switch for 3 Seconds to Turn off);
3. Volume Sensing Technology Automatically Calibrates From concert Volume to conversation Volume;
4. Drive with 2AAA Batteries Installed to Start the Light Up Mode (2 free batteries);
5. Perfect for Riding, Skating at Night, and Many Sports, Halloween, Costume Parties, Masquerades, Mardi Gras, Rave Festivals, Carnivals, Gifts, and more.
description: Do you want to be the Protagonist in the Crowd? Oh! This Light up Mask is for You!
The Mask Perfect for Riding, Skating at night and Many Sports, Halloween, Costume Parties, Masquerades, Mardi Gras, Rave Festivals, Carnivals, Gifts.
It is a Sound active Mask.
How you want to illuminate the Dark.
Their Vibrant Light up Designs is sure to Catch everyone's eyes and Simply Demand Attention.
Skeleton Luminous Mask, Clown Luminous Mask
Comfortable Flannel + PET Luminous Film + Velcro + Driver
High Material and Comfortable Nylon (length: 15.7 in)
Voice-Activated Light Up mode and Built-in Music Rhythm mode (Press and hold the Switch for 3 seconds to Turn On, and then hold the Switch for 3 seconds to Turn Off)
We offer 3 months on the product. If for any reason the mask breaks under normal usage, we will replace it within 30 days.

title: Halloween Cosplay Voice-activated LED Light up Music Mask
Halloween Cosplay LED Light up Music Mask
